channel.title: [F2P]Best way to get runes?
channel.description:
Ok I need to get some runes for my mage. And I need to get alot of chaos runes and I need em in cheap (Flame all you want :P I'm not rich :rolleyes: ) The following are the best methods I know right now.
Mind:runecrafting Airs:Runecrafting or Air mage Fire:Runecrafting or Fire Mage Water:Runecrafting or Water Mage Earth:RuneCrafting or Earth Mage Body:Runecrafting or monster drops Chaos:Monster drops only? Death:Monster drops only? Cosmic:Monster drops only? Nature:Monster drops only?

item.title: [F2P]Best way to get runes?
item.dc:creator: @NickMoran06 NickMoran06
item.description:
@NickMoran06 wrote:

You forgot Law Runes. If you want Law Runes, go Law Runnng. Go to the Harbour with 27 Un-noted Pure Essence and go to Entrana I think it’s called (or something similar) then go Nort East until you see the Law Altar. Once you are there trade with High Leveled Players and they will swap 27 Law Runes and possibly 27 Noted Pure Essence for 27 Pure Essence. Once you have traded head to the Bank and un-note the Pure Essence and keep doing this. This was featured in the official RuneScape Millions Guide and is featured in many other Money Making Guides. May I suggest going to the Mage Guild and selling 1k each.

Read full topic

item.title: [F2P]Best way to get runes?
item.dc:creator: @Erj Erj
item.description:
@Erj wrote:

[quote=“PaulT, post:6, topic:20232”]Wildy spawn for chaos runes.

Get a few level 20+ noob characters and a few open Runescape windows, and spend the night on multiple characters collecting chaos runes on different worlds. If a player comes, log out. It is possible to get 5k+ chaos runes in one night with practice. You can die and lose 'em, but it’s fun if you have ok pking characters.

Same for cosmic and nature runes.

Another method you could try is just level up your main a few combat levels only on wizzys/dark wizzys. You will get at least several hundred of every kind of rune. Wear dragonhide, power ammy, rune scimmy, antidragbreath shield.[/quote]
Yeah this sounds good thanks

Read full topic

[quote=“PaulT, post:6, topic:20232”]Wildy spawn for chaos runes.

Get a few level 20+ noob characters and a few open Runescape windows, and spend the night on multiple characters collecting chaos runes on different worlds. If a player comes, log out. It is possible to get 5k+ chaos runes in one night with practice. You can die and lose 'em, but it’s fun if you have ok pking characters.

Same for cosmic and nature runes.

Another method you could try is just level up your main a few combat levels only on wizzys/dark wizzys. You will get at least several hundred of every kind of rune. Wear dragonhide, power ammy, rune scimmy, antidragbreath shield.[/quote]

I wouldn’t suggest going to wildy for comsics he’ll most likely get killed then.

Yeah wildy’s the best for chaos runes.

item.description:
@PaulT wrote:

Wildy spawn for chaos runes.

Get a few level 20+ noob characters and a few open Runescape windows, and spend the night on multiple characters collecting chaos runes on different worlds. If a player comes, log out. It is possible to get 5k+ chaos runes in one night with practice. You can die and lose 'em, but it’s fun if you have ok pking characters.

Same for cosmic and nature runes.

Another method you could try is just level up your main a few combat levels only on wizzys/dark wizzys. You will get at least several hundred of every kind of rune. Wear dragonhide, power ammy, rune scimmy, antidragbreath shield.
